alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 23 at 1:49PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ TO 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph are expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 to 70 mph are expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, and Eastern Culberson County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ to 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may result in localized visibility reductions.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
